```{r}

library(tidyverse)

quant_data <- rnorm(10, 0, 1)
qual_data <- c("Of", "All", "The", "Souls", "I", "Have", "Encountered", "In", "My", "Travels")

df <- tibble::as_tibble(cbind(quant_data, qual_data)) %>%
  mutate(quant_data = as.numeric(paste0(quant_data, sep = "")))

glimpse(df)

```
